title: More Perreca's
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Italian, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located adjacent to the landmark Perreca's Bakery run by the same family since 1913. The food is traditional Italian Grandma fare. Vegetarian-friendly dishes are delineated by a "v" before the menu item while the dinner menu has a devoted section of vegetarian dishes. All vegetarian preparation is done with dedicated equipment to avoid cross-contamination with non-vegetarian dishes.
